story_zako_battle_26_02/3701_0101_0100_1:
*sigh* It’s great to have people hoping for your
success, but it can get really tiring.
story_zako_battle_26_02/3701_0101_0200_1:
I’m actually no good at this. I don’t have any
talent at all!
story_zako_battle_26_02/3701_0101_0300_1:
I’m going to retire as a Pokémon Trainer if I lose
this battle, OK?
story_zako_battle_26_02/3701_0501_0100_1:
Hey! You were supposed to lose on purpose to
cheer me up!
story_zako_battle_26_02/3701_0501_0200_1:
I’m going to retire! I’m really going to do it! And
it’ll be all your fault, you know!
story_zako_battle_26_02/3801_0101_0100_1:
Glasses look better on me than on anyone else on
Pasio! Look at my overwhelming air of intelligence!
Truly second to none!
story_zako_battle_26_02/3801_0101_0200_1:
Intelligence? Give me a break! Your intelligence is
no match for the overwhelming air of affluence
that MY glasses give off!
story_zako_battle_26_02/3801_0101_0300_1:
Hey, hey, heyyy! Aren’t you two forgetting these
awesomely stylish glasses of mine?!
story_zako_battle_26_02/3801_0401_0500_1:
Huh? This isn’t a super stylish pair of glasses?
I just picked it up over there...
story_zako_battle_26_02/3801_0402_0700_1:
Oh, uh, I’m not a part of Team Break. I’m just a
random passerby who happened to find this on the
ground over there.
story_zako_battle_26_02/3801_0501_0200_1: My glasses are the most fitting of all!
